summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of REclose AI Receptionist SaaS Dashboard. Successfully tested UI components, navigation, form functionality, and protected routes. Authentication integration with Supabase is failing, preventing full dashboard testing.

integration_issues.issue: Supabase authentication failing with 400 status errors for both signup and login attempts

design_issues.issue: Using CDN Tailwind CSS instead of production build - should use PostCSS plugin

passed_tests: Auth page shows login form with email and password fields
Toggle between Login and Sign Up modes works
Sign Up form shows Full Name field when in signup mode
Dashboard routes are protected (redirect to /auth if not logged in)
Back to home button functionality works
Form validation shows error messages correctly
UI design matches luxury modern dark theme requirements
All interactive elements have proper styling and hover states
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix Supabase authentication integration. Both signup and login are failing with 400 status errors. Check: 1) Supabase project configuration and credentials, 2) Database tables setup (leads, receptionists, profiles), 3) Authentication policies, 4) RLS (Row Level Security) settings. Once auth is working, dashboard functionality can be fully tested.
